WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 16, DNC 17.
55 FOOT S/V THE ABBY DISABLED AND ADRIFT
DUE TO LOST RUDDER IN 33-00.98N 072-35.42W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
RCC NORFOLK, PHONE: 757 398 6390,
FAX: 757 398 6392, E-MAIL: RCCNORFOLK@USCG.MIL.
